full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SPRUL PA'I CHOS SKYONG RGYAL PO SKU LNGA'I TSOGS MCHOD BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003B (RGYAL PO SKU LNGA'I TSOGS MCHOD 'DI NI DKON MCHOG LA MI PHYED PAS DAD PA LDAN PA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG STOBS LDAN GYIS NAN TAN CHEN POS BSKUL BA LTAR, RGYAL PO SKU LNGA'I TSOGS MCHOD SNGON MED GZHAN GYI TSOGS KYI 'KHOR LO TSOGS 'GRIMS, SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG ZHABS DRUNG KARMA MANYZU GO shA MING CAN GYIS BSGRIGS PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA BSTAN PA DAR ZHING RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG ,DGE'O, ,)
author_simple: KARMA MANYZU GO shA MING CAN,
